title: Field Service Technician - German Speaking (w/m/d)
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every designer, engineer, researcher, clinic, artist, and manufacturer.
Founded at MIT in 2011, and reaching double-unicorn status in 2021, Formlabs is one of the leading 3D printer manufacturers in the world. At our dynamically-growing team of 800+ people, we're building a company so diverse that we can tackle any challenge.
As a 3D Printer Field Service Technician and member of the Formlabs Services team, you'll resolve technical issues, investigate machine errors, and evaluate printer logs on and off-site. Onsite, you’ll perform visits to train and onboard new partners and customers, as well as repair and maintain their 3D printers. Offsite, you’ll assist Formlabs’ partners and customers with technical issues via email and phone. 
If this sounds like an exciting opportunity for you to use your technical expertise and you’re willing to travel to resolve 3D printer issues hands-on, join us as our 3D Printer Field Service Technician (w/m/d)!This is a remote position based from Munich or Munich area.
The Job:

Technically support our partners and customers in resolving issues with their 3D printers by email and phone
Perform on-site 3D printer installations, on-boarding, training, repairs, and maintenance for partners and customers in the field
Help partners deliver outstanding service to their customers 
Collaborate on solving technical issues with our global engineering team

You:

Are fluent in German and English
Have a degree or working experience in Mechatronics or a similar field
Can quickly resolve technical issues, troubleshoot, test, and repair hardware
Have a valid driving license
Enjoy connecting with people and are a great listener
Are comfortable and conscientious when speaking on the phone
Can autonomously manage your time and workload
Need to be able to prioritize the field visit according to business needs

Bonus Skills:

Previous experience as a Field Service Technician
Experience with Additive Manufacturing 
B2B service experience
Passion for 3D printing and emerging technologies
Experience in a fast-growing startup environment
Salesforce

Our Perks:

Share options in the company (we’re a Unicorn company, valued at over $2Bn!)
An inclusive work environment with diverse, international, inspiring colleagues
An exceptionally fast-growing company in a highly disruptive industry
Development opportunities both in-house and off-site

We build amazing things. Come join us!
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply. Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

How did you hear about us?

values.label: I haven't heard of Formlabs until now

questions.label: What are your salary expectations in EUR? (gross annual)
Which languages are you fluent in? (both oral and written)
